title: Context Engineering for AI Agents in Open-Source Software
summary: GenAI-based coding assistants have disrupted software development. Their next generation is agent-based, operating with more autonomy and potentially without human oversight. One challenge is to provide AI agents with sufficient context about the software projects they operate in.
